mapper.insert: insert into board(boardid , boardname , addtime , memo ) values(#{boardid} , #{boardname} , #{addtime} , #{memo} )
mapper.update: update board set boardname=#{boardname} , addtime=#{addtime} , memo=#{memo} where boardid=#{boardid}
mapper.select: select a.* from board a order by boardid asc
select a.* from board a where boardid=#{boardid} order by boardid desc

select a.* from board a where 1=1
and a.boardname like CONCAT('%', CONCAT(#{boardname}, '%'))
and a.addtime like CONCAT('%', CONCAT(#{addtime}, '%'))
and a.memo like CONCAT('%', CONCAT(#{memo}, '%'))
